alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bedford County through 945 PM EDT... At 916 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stewartsville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bedford... Montvale... Stewartsville... Chamblissburg... Peaks Of Otter Summit... Peaks Of Otter Recreation Area... and Thaxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
